tuv.seg: Going to primary school
Dul chun na bunscoile
Life Event Document Starting school Find out what is involved when starting school at primary level
Life Event Document Tosú ar scoil Tugann an doiciméad seo cur síos ar an gcóras oideachais bhunscolaíochta in Éirinn
This document describes who owns primary schools and how they are funded
Déanann an cháipéis seo cur síos ar úinéireacht bunscoileanna agus an chaoi a bhfuil siad maoinithe
Curriculum in primary schools
An curaclam sna bunscoileanna
An outline of the primary school curriculum, including its aims, structure and content
Achoimre ar an gcuraclam bunscoile, ag cur san áireamh aidhmeanna, struchtúr agus ábhar
Boards of management in primary schools
Boird bhainistíochta i mbunscoileanna
This document describes the rules governing boards of management of primary schools
Tá cur síos anseo ar na rialacha a bhaineann le boird bhainistíochta i mbunscoileanna
Who owns primary schools and how they are they funded?
Tá cur síos anseo ar cé leo na bunscoileanna agus conas a mhaoinítear iad
Tackling disadvantage in primary schools
Ag dul i ngleic le míbhuntáiste i mbunscoileanna
Describes schemes that provide additional resources for primary schools with large numbers of disadvantaged pupils
Tá go leor scéimeanna a thugann breis acmhainní do bhunscoileanna le líon mór páistí faoi mhíbhuntáiste
Special needs education in primary schools
Oideachas riachtanas speisialta i mbunscoileanna
The arrangements for special needs education in primary schools include learning support/resource teachers and special needs assistants
Cuimsíonn na socruithe d’oideachas riachtanas speisialta i mbunscoileanna múinteoirí tacaíochta foghlama/múinteoirí acmhainne agus cúntóirí riachtanas speisialta
Primary school transport scheme
An scéim iompair bhunscoile
The transport scheme for primary school pupils and information on how to qualify
Déantar cur síos ar an scéim iompair bhunscoile agus na coinníollacha a bhaineann leí
School transport for children with special needs
Iompar scoile do ghasúir le riachtanais speisialta
Children who are enrolled in State special schools or in special classes in State primary schools may qualify for free transport to school
Is féidir le gasúir atá ar an rolla i Scoileanna Speisialta Stáit nó i Ranganna Speisialta i mBunscoileanna Stáit bheith i dteideal iompar saor in aisce a fháil idir an baile agus an scoil
Organisations and resources for primary schools
Eagraíochtaí agus acmhainní do bhunscoileanna
Outlines organisations and internet resources providing information on education at primary level
Cur síos ar eagraíochtaí agus na hacmhainní Idirlín a thugann faisnéis faoin mbunoideachas
Moving your children to primary school
Do pháiste a aistriú chuig bunscoil in Éirinn
Introduces the system of education in Ireland at primary level and information describes the procedures involved in enrolling a child in primary school
Tá cur síos anseo ar an gcóras bunscolaíochta in Éirinn agus eolas ar na córais iarratais a bhaineann leo agus ar do pháiste a chur chuig do rogha scoil
This document is in: Moving Country > Moving to Ireland > Introduction to the Irish System
This document is in: Ag bogadh tíre > Teacht go hÉirinn > Tús eolais ar chóras na hÉireann
Most Read in "Education and Training"
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Oideachas agus Oiliúint"
School terms in primary and post-primary schools
Téarmaí scoile i mbunscoileanna agus iarbhunscoileanna
Further Education and Training (FET) allowances
Táillí do scoláirí tríú leibhéal
